mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(login_id, password,name, email, nickname, age, birthday, gender, profile_img) VALUES(#{loginId},#{password},#{name},#{email},#{nickname},#{age}, #{birthday}, #{gender},#{profileImg})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET login_id = #{loginId}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, age = #{age}, birthday = #{birthday}, gender = #{gender}, profile_img = #{profileImg}
